title: Quantitative Analysis Methodology for Mathematics Education Content

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Large-scale asynchronous education program conducted in an LMS environment for current elementary mathematics practitioners. Involves project-based assessments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically classify mathematics educational materials by applying the DCAM (Defining, Coding, Analyzing, Modeling) methodology
Learners can quantify variables in mathematics educational content using nominal/ordinal/interval coding techniques
Learners can measure coding reliability and analyze content patterns using statistical techniques such as t-tests and chi-square tests
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
